name: DataTransferToCureSma
description: This EM will retrieve data from REDCap, package it in FHIR json format and send it to CureSMA

project-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

Select the demographic form
Select the form which holds the demographic fields

Select the event where the demographic form exists
Select the event where the form which holds the demographic fields exist

Select the diagnosis form
Select the form which holds the diagnosis fields. This form should be repeating so many diagnosis codes can be stored.

Select the diagnosis event
Select the event which holds the diagnosis form used for submission. This form should be repeating so many diagnosis codes can be stored.

Select the lab form
Select the form which holds the lab fields. This form should be repeating so many lab values can be stored.

Select the lab event
Select the event which holds the lab form used for submission. This form should be repeating so many lab values can be stored.

Select the encounter form
Select the form which holds the encounter fields. This form should be repeating so many encounters can be saved.

Select the encounter event
Select the event which holds the encounter form used for submission. This form should be repeating so many encounters can be stored.

Select the medication form
Select the form which holds the medication fields. This form should be repeating so many mediations can be saved.

Select the medication event
Select the event which holds the medication form used for submission. This form should be repeating so many medications can be stored.

Select the procedure form
Select the form which holds the procedure fields. This form should be repeating so many procedures can be saved.

Select the procedure event
Select the event which holds the procedure form used for submission. This form should be repeating so many procedure can be stored.

Select the Allergy form
Select the form which holds the allergy fields. This form should be repeating so many allergies can be saved.

Select the allergy event
Select the event which holds the allergy form used for submission. This form should be repeating so many allergies can be stored.

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
Organization submitting data For Stanford, either SHC (https://stanfordhealthcare.org/) or Stanford (https://www.stanford.edu/)
URL of CureSMA Registry URL to submit CureSMA Registry Data
Certificate file location Certificate file location (path) to use for authorization
Certificate key location Certificate key location (path) to use for authorization
Certificate password Certificate password used for authorization that must be sent along with the certificate to verify the Stanford site
Certificate file data Certificate file to use for authorization which will be downloaded and sent via API call
Certificate key data Certificate key to use for authorization which will be downloaded and sent via API call
REDCap project that holds medication list Project which holds list of medications any patient in the cohort has been prescribed
